change.changenote: Section 2 definition of "professional engineering licensee" BEFORE amended by BC Reg 32/2023, effective February 10, 2023.

bcl:definition.bcl:text: professional engineering licensee means a registrant who is authorized by the regulatory body to use the title "professional engineering licensee".

change.changenote: Section 4 (b) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 32/2023, effective February 10, 2023.
Section 5 (1) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 32/2023, effective February 10, 2023.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: For the purposes of section 51 (1) (b) [reserved practice] of the Act, the practice of professional engineering, as it relates to matters that, having regard to the protective purposes, require the experience or technical knowledge of a professional engineer or professional engineering licensee, is a reserved practice that may only be carried out by or under the supervision of a registrant.

change.changenote: Section 6 definition of "professional geoscience licensee" BEFORE amended by BC Reg 32/2023, effective February 10, 2023.

bcl:definition.bcl:text: professional geoscience licensee means a registrant who is authorized by the regulatory body to use the title "professional geoscience licensee".

change.changenote: Section 8 (b) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 32/2023, effective February 10, 2023.
Section 9 (1) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 32/2023, effective February 10, 2023.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: For the purposes of section 51 (1) (b) [reserved practice] of the Act, the practice of professional geoscience, as it relates to matters that, having regard to the protective purposes, require the experience or technical knowledge of a professional geoscientist or professional geoscience licensee, is a reserved practice that may only be carried out by or under the supervision of a registrant.
